last_episode_to_air.name: Decision Time
last_episode_to_air.overview: Finally, the wedding day arrives. The weather is gorgeous. Friends and family are gathered. But are the brides and grooms ready to tie the knot?

name: Love Is Blind: Japan
original_name: ラブ・イズ・ブラインド JAPAN
overview: In this reality dating series, marriage-minded singles in Japan meet, date and get engaged — before ever setting eyes on each other.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Is love really blind? The reality show Love is Blind is coming to Japan!  Singles who want to be loved for who they are, rather than what they look like, have signed up for a less conventional approach to modern dating where they hope to meet the person they want to spend the rest of their lives with...without ever having seen them. With no distractions from the outside world, the singles talk to a stream of potential love interests and when back in the real world, as the couples plan towards their wedding day, they will quickly discover whether they can turn their emotional connection into a true love before the fast-approaching ceremony.  Takashi Fujii and Yuka Itaya will be navigators for Love is Blind: Japan and see how the social experiment goes on.

episodes.name: Falling in Love...through a Wall
episodes.overview: Hosts Takashi Fujii and Yuka Itaya meet the men and women looking for love. Comedian Odacchi is a hit with the ladies, but is he marriage material?

episodes.name: Nice to Meet You, My Beloved
episodes.overview: While one happy couple meets face to face, others struggle to make a mutual connection. A letter correspondence blossoms into something more.

episodes.name: Labyrinth of Love
episodes.overview: The guys share notes and notice that Ayano has been using the same line on a lot of them. Wanting answers, Midori gets down to business.

episodes.name: That’s When You Moved my Heart
episodes.overview: Restaurateur Mizuki leaves Priya hungry for more. Mori sorts through his emotions and makes his move. Meanwhile, Kaoru tries to slow things down.

episodes.name: Just the Two of Us
episodes.overview: The engaged couples depart for their romantic getaways, where they'll have plenty of opportunities to get to know each other.

episodes.name: Endings and Beginnings
episodes.overview: The more time Nanako spends with Odacchi, the more distance she feels. Yudai starts to have second thoughts. Can romance last outside the pods?

episodes.name: The Cohabitation Test
episodes.overview: Things start to get real. After making it through their romantic retreats, the remaining couples see if they can survive living together.

episodes.name: Once More on One Knee
episodes.overview: As the wedding day approaches, some start to get cold feet. Can Wataru keep up with Midori's friends? Ryotaro's bad boy looks cause concern.

episodes.name: An Ill-Fitting Dress
episodes.overview: Laughter and excitement fill the air when Yuka helps the women pick out their wedding dresses. But Priya isn't smiling.

episodes.name: Countdown to "I Do"
episodes.overview: It's time for Ryotaro to meet the parents. Can Misaki keep his princess happy? Familiar faces return for the bachelor and bachelorette parties.

episodes.name: Decision Time
episodes.overview: Finally, the wedding day arrives. The weather is gorgeous. Friends and family are gathered. But are the brides and grooms ready to tie the knot?
